snippet: The victim told the police she had a confrontation with her attacker about a week and half ago, when she took a photograph of him masturbating in the park.
abstract: The victim told the police she had a confrontation with her attacker about a week and half ago, when she took a photograph of him masturbating in the park.

byline.original: By WENDY RUDERMAN and ANDY NEWMAN

headline.main: Woman, 73, Raped in Central Park in Broad Daylight
headline.print_headline: Woman, 73, Is Raped in Central Park
